Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for the compute resources, including scalability, performance, and redundancy needs. Identify the applications and workloads to be hosted on Azure Cloud Services.
Design the architecture for the Azure Cloud Services deployment, including the roles, instances, and network configurations. Ensure the design aligns with best practices for resiliency and security.
Set up or verify the Azure subscription where the Cloud Services will be deployed. Ensure proper billing and access controls are configured.
Deploy the Azure Cloud Services environment, including web roles and worker roles. Configure the instances based on the solution architecture.
Set up virtual networks, subnets, and IP configurations for the Cloud Services. Ensure proper connectivity and isolation as per the design.
Apply security best practices, including encryption, access controls, and firewalls. Configure Network Security Groups (NSGs) and Azure DDoS Protection as needed.
Upload and deploy the application code to the Azure Cloud Services environment. Ensure proper configuration of deployment packages and runtime settings.
Perform thorough testing of the deployed application, including functionality, performance, and failover scenarios. Validate that the environment meets the project requirements.
Set up monitoring and alerting using Azure Monitor and Application Insights. Configure alerts for resource utilization, application errors, and performance metrics.
Create detailed documentation for the Cloud Services setup, including architecture diagrams, configurations, and operational procedures. Share documentation with relevant stakeholders.
Conduct training sessions for the operations team on managing and troubleshooting the Azure Cloud Services environment.
Set up backup and disaster recovery mechanisms for the Cloud Services environment. Ensure regular backups and test recovery procedures.
Verify that the Cloud Services setup complies with organizational and regulatory requirements. Conduct regular audits to ensure ongoing compliance.
Regularly review and optimize the performance of the Cloud Services environment. Adjust instance sizes, scaling settings, and configurations as needed.
Continuously monitor the health and performance of deployed cloud services using Azure Monitor. Set up alerts for any anomalies or performance degradation.
Regularly apply security patches and updates to the operating system and application components of the cloud service to mitigate vulnerabilities.
Ensure regular backups of service configurations and critical data. Verify the integrity of backups and test restoration processes periodically.
Monitor resource utilization and scale up or down the compute resources to meet demand while optimizing costs.
Perform failover tests to ensure high availability and validate that the service can recover from failures without data loss or downtime.
Review and update access controls and permissions to ensure only authorized personnel have access to the cloud service resources.
Review and optimize the configuration of the cloud service to ensure it aligns with best practices and operational requirements.
Periodically review the SLAs for the cloud service to ensure compliance with organizational requirements and address any deviations.
Conduct incident response drills to prepare the team for potential outages or security incidents. Ensure familiarity with response protocols.
Review cost and usage reports to identify opportunities for cost optimization and ensure the service remains within budget.
Test application updates in a staging environment before deploying them to production to ensure compatibility and stability.
Regularly review and rotate encryption keys used for securing data in the cloud service to maintain compliance and security.

Tasks.Task: Engage in Training and Skill Development
Tasks.Task Description: Ensure the operations team participates in regular training to stay updated with new features, best practices, and security measures for cloud services.
